root.Summary: 1: Suddason T, Gallagher E. A RING to rule them all? Insights into the Map3k1 PHDmotif provide a new mechanistic understanding into the diverse roles of Map3k1.Cell Death Differ. 2015 Apr;22(4):540-8. doi: 10.1038/cdd.2014.239. Epub 2015 Jan23. Review.
